TEXT.BODY: Fruit of the Loom Inc said an initial public offering of 27 mln Class A common shares is underway at nine dlrs per share through underwriters led by <Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc>, Merrill Lynch and Co Inc <MER>, E.F.
